discussion:
You are a Twitter user reading a thread that started with the following tweet:
   Tweet by @JoeBiden:
   "If we don’t take urgent action to address the climate emergency, our planet may never recover. We must get the climate change denier out of the White House and tackle this crisis head-on."
   Consider and respond to the full context of the conversation. Avoid repetition; introduce new angles or synthesize previous ideas.
   You may tag @JoeBiden and/or the users <name>: you are replying to.
   Stay under 280 characters per message. Every time you respond, start with <name>:.

@JoeBiden: Oh, NOW you care about urgent action? How about the urgent action of securing the border or lowering inflation? Easy to virtue signal about the climate from your ivory tower, isn't it? #EmptyPromises #Bidenflation
@JoeBiden: "Never recover"? Seriously? Drama much? Maybe focus on the REAL emergencies facing Americans right now, like affording groceries and gas. #Priorities #DoBetter

Agent2:@JoeBiden: Climate emergency? More like economic emergency thanks to your policies! How about we drill, baby, drill and actually lower costs for hardworking Americans? #EnergyIndependence #CommonSense
Agent3:@JoeBiden: Climate change is a hoax! The only thing dying is our economy under your woke policies. Get your hands off our gas stoves and let us live our lives! #MAGA #Freedom

Agent4:@JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? Spare me the theatrics. We need REAL solutions, not virtue signaling. How about investing in practical tech & clean energy that actually works, instead of crippling our economy with regulations? #CommonSense #EnergyForAll

Agent5: @JoeBiden: The planet will be fine. It's our wallets that are dying thanks to your policies! How about some real solutions for the working class instead of pushing this woke agenda? #DrillBabyDrill #AmericaFirst

Agent6: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? I see a manufactured crisis to justify more government control and spending. How about we focus on individual liberty and economic prosperity instead of fear-mongering? #NoClimateEmergency #FreedomFirst

Agent7: @JoeBiden: "Climate emergency"? More like a power grab disguised as environmentalism. How about you address the actual emergencies YOU created, like the border crisis and runaway inflation? #AccountabilityNow #BidenDisaster

Agent8: @JoeBiden: The "climate emergency" narrative conveniently ignores the real emergency: Biden's border crisis. Fix that first, then talk about hypothetical apocalypses. #SecureTheBorder #Priorities
Agent9: @Agent4: Exactly! Practical tech, not crippling regulations. Carbon taxes are a scam. #EnergyForAll #StopBiden
